episodes.title: Season 1, Cassette 10: Horopito
episodes.summary:
Cassette #10: Horopito
Episode 10 of 10 - Season 1 Finale

# # #

Support Season 2 of Within the Wires by making a donation at withinthewires.com and clicking on Donate. Donors of $50 or more receive an exclusive prologue episode of the new season.

Within the Wires T-Shirts and Posters are now available, withinthewires.com.

Music: Mary Epworth, maryepworth.com

Written by Jeffrey Cranor and Janina Matthewson. Performed by Janina Matthewson.

Logo by Rob Wilson, robwilsonwork.com

Part of the Night Vale Presents network. nightvalepresents.com

episodes.title: Within the Wires - Teaser
episodes.summary:
Within the Wires, a new serial fiction podcast from the team behind Welcome to Night Vale and Alice Isn't Dead. New episodes every other Tuesday from June 21 through October 25. Subscribe now on iTunes, Libsyn, or via RSS on your favorite podcatcher: withinthewires.libsyn.com.

Music: Mary Epworth, maryepworth.com

Written by Jeffrey Cranor and Janina Matthewson. Performed by Janina Matthewson.

Logo by Rob Wilson, robwilsonwork.com

Part of the Night Vale Presents network. nightvalepresents.com
